title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Ahmad M (2025). repo100: Meta-regression datasets helpers. R package version 0.1.0, https://mahmood789.github.io/repo100/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {repo100: Meta-regression datasets and helpers},   author = {Mahmood Ahmad},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://mahmood789.github.io/repo100/}, }

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: curated collection meta-regression–ready datasets (currently 137 sets). dataset CSV yi, vi, measure, harmonized moderators inst/extdata/metareg/. See _manifest.csv summary provenance.

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
What the Package Does (Title Case)
code: m <- metareg_manifest() head(m[, c('dataset_id','k','measure','n_mods')]) ids <- metareg_datasets() d  <- metareg_read(ids[1]) metafor::rma(yi, vi, data = d)

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: Package code: MIT. Datasets: CC--4.0 unless otherwise indicated _manifest.csv (repo_license).

title: List datasets in the registry that support meta-regression — list_metareg_datasets
text: min_mods Minimum number moderator columns (default 1) min_k Minimum number studies (default 5) real_only Drop simulated/toy/example-ish id/title (default TRUE) pattern Optional regex id/title pre-filter registry

Meta-regression dataset helpers — metareg-helpers
text: Lightweight helpers discover load curated meta-regression datasets shipped package (CSV files `inst/extdata/metareg/`).

title: Meta-regression dataset helpers — metareg-helpers
text: development (without installing package), can point helpers local export folder via: options(metahub.metareg_dir = "metahub/inst/derived/metareg")

title: Meta-regression dataset helpers — metareg-helpers

text: data.frame one row per dataset (id, source, k, measure, etc.).

title: List the meta-regression manifest — metareg_manifest
code: m <- metareg_manifest() head(m[, c("dataset_id","k","measure","n_mods")]) #>                      dataset_id    k      measure n_mods #> 1       metadat_dat.lehmann2018   81 from_dataset     47 #> 2       metadat_dat.mccurdy2020 1653 from_dataset     25 #> 3 psymetadata_stasielowicz2019b   86 from_dataset     22 #> 4 psymetadata_stasielowicz2019a   76 from_dataset     21 #> 5  psymetadata_stasielowicz2020  133 from_dataset     21 #> 6        metadat_dat.curtis1998  102          SMD     20

title: Create a standardized meta-analysis dataset object — new_metadset
text: data data.frame/tibble columns study_id, yi, vi. meta named list metadata (source, citation, license, tags, etc.) id Optional registry id schema_version Schema version

title: Create a standardized meta-analysis dataset object — new_metadset
